alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch; Northern Ware; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Atkinson, northwestern Ware and Clinch Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cogdell, or near Argyle, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Argyle, Du Pont, Pebble Hill, Manor, Cogdell, Dixie Union, Needham and Millwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atkinson; Clinch; Northern Ware; Southern Ware
